text: int main ( ) { long int i , n , t ; long int * a , s ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; a = ( long int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( long int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , a + i ) ; } s = * ( a + 0 ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( * ( a + i ) < s ) { s = * ( a + i ) ; } } printf ( "%ld\n" , s * ( n - 1 ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
